To the right honorable my very singular good Lord
e L. Burghley Lord highe Treasurer of England.

4 Fe
b
1591. M
r
Bodeleie to my L.
The cawse of disimbarquinge of
e 20 Compagnies that showld have gon into
France.
His opinion for 5000 or 6000 soldiers to be imployed thence this sommer for France./
